sentence: Avon Products, Inc. ( AVP ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 11, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.06 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 01, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased AVP prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 12th quarter that AVP has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $6.13, the dividend yield is 3.92%.
The previous trading day's last sale of AVP was $6.13, representing a -57.01% decrease from the 52 week high of $14.26 and a 18.8% increase over the 52 week low of $5.16.
AVP is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
AVP's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$.8.
Zacks Investment Research reports AVP's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as -53.19%, compared to an industry average of -6.3%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the AVP Dividend History page.
